News today

The news of Russia and the world on the IC.RU website is updated every minute. Day news is the latest, most urgent reports from authoritative sources. We are choosing the main events for today ' s MK site, conducting a thorough online monitoring of messages from major news agencies, government authorities, public organizations and Newsmekers.

"Muskous Soldier" is a matter of urgency.
